definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: So clearly 26.100 is not an inertial reference frame.
sentences.chinese: 所以很明顯教室不能作爲慣性參考系。

sentences.english: Remanent magnetism of soil layer is taken as a reference frame for locating hydrocarbon seepage zone.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用土壤剩餘磁性作爲確定烴類滲漏帶的參考系。

sentences.english: This paper may offer some references for scholars engaged in research on TRS.
sentences.chinese: 本文可爲從事地球參考系研究的學者提供一定的參考。

sentences.english: Consider BCS pairing in the frame co-moving with the flow.
sentences.chinese: 考慮與流動同時移動的參考系下的BCS配對。

sentences.english: Euler parameters are employed to describe the rotations of body reference.
sentences.chinese: 文中採用歐拉參數來描述部件參考系的轉動。
